#summary The development roadmap
#labels Phase-Requirements,Featured

= NautilusSvn 0.12 =
All issues (bugs or feature requests) with [http://code.google.com/p/nautilussvn/issues/list?q=label:Milestone-Release0.12 label:Milestone-0.12] will be resolved

Most important bug fixes:
  * SSL authentication (Issue #1, Issue #2)
  * Unicode support (Issue #8)

Most important features:
  * Submenu support (Issue #6), see [http://code.google.com/p/nautilussvn/wiki/ContextMenuStructure ContextMenuStructure]

= Future =
  * Issue #4 (Inadequate (sub-par) performance) will eventually be resolved
  * Implementation of a property page (Issue #10)
  * Emblem support will be improved (no issue yet?), remove the need for "Refresh status"
